name: Metal Gear Solid
description: A stealth action masterpiece. Follow Solid Snake on a thrilling mission to save the world.
review: I played through this game on my Steam Deck via the master collection and thought it was great. I especially enjoyed exploring the levels, fighting each unique boss, and the stealth mechanics.

name: Manhunt
description: An intense and gritty stealth-action game with a dark atmosphere.
review: Manhunt was intense with a lot of atmospheric tension. The gameplay and visuals were gritty and memorable.

name: Dark Souls 3
description: The final chapter in the Dark Souls trilogy with challenging combat and breathtaking worlds.
review: A haunting and rewarding experience with some of the best boss fights in the series.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2
description: Sequel to the action-packed Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine.
review: I especially enjoyed exploring the levels, fighting each unique boss, and the stealth mechanics.

name: Resident Evil 2 Remake
description: A modern take on the survival horror classic with stunning visuals.
review: An incredible remake with thrilling gameplay and an atmosphere that keeps you on edge.

name: Song of Iron
description: A gritty side-scrolling action game with beautiful visuals and engaging combat.
review: Atmospheric with engaging combat and beautiful art.

name: Mortal Kombat 1
description: Brutal and entertaining fighting game with exciting new mechanics.
review: A bold entry with exciting new mechanics and thrilling combat.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
description: Step into the shoes of Sam Fisher, a highly trained secret operative in a world of espionage.
review: Infiltrate terrorist positions, acquire critical intelligence by any means necessary, and execute with extreme prejudice.

name: Hitman: Codename 47
description: A stealth assassination game that introduced Agent 47 to the world.
review: A classic stealth-action game with innovative mechanics and tense missions.

name: Thief: Deadly Shadows
description: A stealth game that immerses you in a world of shadows and thievery.
review: A tense and atmospheric stealth game with great level design and engaging gameplay.
